When we return from picture intent, we can run in the situation where onCreate gets called, immediately followed by onSaveInstanceState, and a second time onCreate. This is due to the camera manipulating device orientation. In this scenario, we use the account and method, since onSaveInstanceSate was solely relying on the spinner selection, which is not updated yet in this scenario.
